info.name: Deals API
info.description:
# Deal API Documentation

Base URL:

```
/api/deals
```

---

# Deal Fields

```ts
thumbnail_photo?: Media            // send as numeric ID
cover_photo?: Media                // send as numeric ID
is_featured?: boolean
law_firms?: Firm[]                 // connect via documentId
lawyers?: Lawyer[]                 // connect via documentId
country?: string
country_code?: string
city?: string
title?: string
total_value?: string
description?: string
overview?: BlocksListItem[]        // [{ "text": "..." }]
type?: "M&A" | "Private Equity"
jurisdiction?: "Europe" | "UK" | "Germany" | "USA" | "France" | "Asia & Middle East"
size?: "x<500M" | "x>500M&x<1B" | "x>1B"
source_url?: string
clients?: BlocksListItem[]         // [{ "text": "..." }]
enrichedId: string
```

---

# Endpoints

## Get All Deals

```
GET /api/deals
```

### Query Options

| Feature         | Example                                       |
| --------------- | --------------------------------------------- |
| Populate all    | `?populate=*`                                 |
| Populate fields | `?populate=law_firms,lawyers`                 |
| Nested populate | `?populate[law_firms][populate]=headquarters` |
| Filter          | `?filters[type][$eq]=M&A`                     |
| Search          | `?filters[title][$containsi]=acquisition`     |
| Pagination      | `?pagination[page]=1&pagination[pageSize]=20` |
| Sorting         | `?sort=total_value:desc`                      |

---

# Populate Examples

### All relations

```
GET /api/deals?populate=*
```

### Nested

```
GET /api/deals?populate[law_firms][populate]=offices
```

```
GET /api/deals?populate[lawyers][populate]=career
```

---

# Filter Examples

```
GET /api/deals?filters[type][$eq]=M&A
```

```
GET /api/deals?filters[jurisdiction][$eq]=USA
```

```
GET /api/deals?filters[size][$eq]=x>1B
```

```
GET /api/deals?filters[law_firms][documentId][$eq]=firm-123
```

```
GET /api/deals?filters[title][$containsi]=acquisition
```

---

# Create Deal

(Strapi Document Mode — relations use **documentId**, media uses **media ID**)

```
POST /api/deals
```

```json
{
  "data": {
    "title": "Acquisition of Finch Group",
    "type": "M&A",
    "jurisdiction": "UK",
    "size": "x>1B",
    "total_value": "$1.2B",
    "city": "London",

    "thumbnail_photo": 28,
    "cover_photo": 55,

    "overview": [
      { "text": "Major acquisition in retail sector." },
      { "text": "Represented buyer consortium." }
    ],

    "clients": [
      { "text": "Finch Holdings" }
    ],

    "law_firms": {
      "connect": [
        { "documentId": "firm-100" },
        { "documentId": "firm-200" }
      ]
    },

    "lawyers": {
      "connect": [
        { "documentId": "lawyer-001" }
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

---

# Update Deal

```
PUT /api/deals/:documentId
```

### Update relational sets + media

```json
{
  "data": {
    "cover_photo": 99,

    "law_firms": {
      "set": [
        { "documentId": "firm-new-01" },
        { "documentId": "firm-new-02" }
      ]
    },

    "lawyers": {
      "connect": [
        { "documentId": "lawyer-add-77" }
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

---

# Disconnect Relations

## Disconnect all law firms (clear many-to-many)

```json
{
  "data": {
    "law_firms": {
      "set": []
    }
  }
}
```

## Disconnect selected lawyers

```json
{
  "data": {
    "lawyers": {
      "disconnect": [
        { "documentId": "lawyer-001" },
        { "documentId": "lawyer-777" }
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

---

# Delete Deal

```
DELETE /api/deals/:documentId
```

---

# Complete Query Example

```
GET /api/deals
  ?populate[law_firms][populate]=offices
  &populate[lawyers][populate]=career
  &filters[type][$eq]=Private%20Equity
  &filters[jurisdiction][$eq]=Europe
  &sort=total_value:desc
  &pagination[page]=1
  &pagination[pageSize]=10
```
